body:
Comment 2 by **mattyjwilliams**: 
There are different errors depending on what is input:

fmt.Println(net.Dial("tcp", "google.com:80"))
<nil> dial tcp: error reading DNS config: open /etc/resolv.conf: No such file or
directory

fmt.Println(net.Dial("tcp", "74.125.224.72:80")) //Google IP
<nil> dial tcp 74.125.224.72:80: Connection refused

fmt.Println(net.Dial("tcp", "127.0.0.1:80")
<nil> dial tcp 127.0.0.1:80: Connection refused

Would it make sense to include each of these in the example? As per:
http://play.golang.org/p/m8Z7Fb3v1k
